values: am; is; are; was; were; being; been
can; could; may; might; must; shall; should; will; would
who; what; where; when; why; how
What about ...?; How about ... ?; Why don't we ...?; Shall we ...?; Do you want to ...?; Let's ... (Shall we?); We could ... (What do you think?)

subtype: Đồng ý và chấp nhận gợi ý
values: Sure; that sound great; Yes, I'd love to; I'm up for it;

subtype: Đề xuất một phương án khác
values: How about we do [alternative suggestion] instead; What if we [alternative suggestion]

subtype: Đưa ra lời khuyên hoặc gợi ý khác
values: Maybe we could [suggestion] instead; Have you considered [alternative suggestion]?

subtype: Yêu cầu thêm thông tin hoặc đề xuất thay đổi
values: Can we make it a bit later?; Is there another option we could explore?

subtype: Từ chối lịch trình hoặc gợi ý
values: I'm not sure that works for me.; I'd rather not, but thanks for the suggestion

subtype: Đề xuất một kế hoạch khác
values: How about we do it another time?; Let's save it for another occasion.
